title: Deals: Google’s official Pixel 6 Pro case hits Amazon low of $24, Wyze Video Doorbell, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are now live as we head into the weekend, with a new Amazon low on Google’s official Pixel 6 Pro cases leading the way. That’s alongside Wyze’s 1080p Video Doorbell at $43 and a new low on the Fitbit Inspire 2 tracker. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Google’s official Pixel 6 Pro case hits Amazon low of $24, Wyze Video Doorbell, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A new Amazon all-time low has arrived on the official Google Pixel 6 Pro Case to go alongside the best 2022 price on Fitbit Inspire 2.
